alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 9:11PM EST until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Indiana... Wabash River. .Multiple rounds of recent rainfall preceded by snow melt, along with the current system moving through with wintry precipitation, will keep minor flooding ongoing along the East Fork White, upper White and most of the Upper Wabash. Lower portions of the White and Wabash are expected to see moderate flooding, where rain of up to an inch fell during the daytime hours Thursday. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Montezuma. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Floodwater is near the top of all agricultural levees. Some county roads are impassable. High water isolates a few rural residents. Basement flooding begins along Water Street in Montezuma. Medusa Aggregates Company Plant Number 9 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 23.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EST Thursday was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 15.0 feet Sunday, March 06. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Friday morning by around 1115 AM EST.
